name: hurricane
description: hurricane that pushes nearest enemy far away.

name: Plant tentacle
description: Big plant tentacle that pulls nearby enemy and attack with its long body.

name: Sentry plant
description: sentry-plant that shoots seeds to nearest enemy.

name: Resurrect orb
description: This flying orb will bring back the zombies.

name: will-o-wisp
description: Will-oâ€™-wisps can be yellow, white, green, or blue.  They are easily mistaken for lanterns, especially in the foggy marshes and swamps where they reside.

name: Fire Element
description: A fire element that looks like a mass of burning flames. It is able to control the power of flames and release powerful flames at will. The flames within its body are always ablaze, burning opponents hot just by touching them, and it can protect itself with a shield of flames.

name: Water Element
description: The water element has the appearance of clear blue water. It has arm- and leg-like parts and can swim with fluid-like supple movements. It can spew water from its mouth, which can also be used for attacks.

name: Earth Element
description: An element that manipulates the power of the earth. It specializes in earth-shaking attacks and surprise attacks from underground. In appearance, it has a massive appearance that looks like a stone or rock motif..

name: Air Element
description: An air element that looks like a typhoon. It constantly manipulates the wind around it and flies through the air. The force of its wind is said to be so strong that it can easily blow away buildings. It has an aggressive character and is a natural disaster, so it must be handled with care.
flying skul that deals cold damage to enemies while keeping a certain distance.

special_attacks.description: The flying skul fires its weapon!

description: black hole that swallows everything.
A laser turret created by magic.
KaBooooooooom!.
Skeleton snake that sprays acid on nearby enemies.

name: Wooden decoy
description:
This wood seems like you! 
 Everyone doesn't doubt.
Conjured lightning Tornado that moves while shooting many lightning toward enemies and swallow nearby objects.

special_attacks.description: The summon hole fires its weapon!

name: Blight Box
description: This box emits weakly light continuously.
The plague rat, an omnivorous rodent with sheer black fur and a long, rough tail.  Harbinger of pestilence, famine, and mange, it will sometimes swarm over the dead or dying.
The plague rat, an omnivorous rodent with sheer black fur and a long, rough tail.  Harbinger of pestilence, famine, and mange, it will sometimes swarm over the dead or dying.

name: Skeleton Grave
description: Summon 2 of lesser skeletons every 8 seconds.

name: Monster Apple Tree
description: At first glance, it looks like just another apple tree. But this tree produces many monsters.
An apple monster.
An apple monster.
An apple monster.
A lesser skeleton, raised from grave.

name: Crystal golem
description: A golem made of mana crystal. It has a variety of attack methods.
Waaaaaaaaave!.

name: One-eyed bat
description: This monster will not move from its spot and has the ability to share its vision with you!
A feather that emits light. It flies toward enemies at high speed.

name: Magic Tower
description: Magic tower that keeps irradiating lasers at the target enemy. Each time that enemy continues to be irradiated by the laser, the damage it takes is increased and its movement speed is reduced.

name: Ice Golem
description: A large humanoid golem made of ice. Depending on the individual, they can attack at long range or use magic.

name: Ice Golem:Big Body
description: A large humanoid golem made of ice. Depending on the individual, they can attack at long range or use magic.

name: Ice Golem:Swift Body
description: A large humanoid golem made of ice. Depending on the individual, they can attack at long range or use magic.

name: Ice Golem:Mage
description: A large humanoid golem made of ice. Depending on the individual, they can attack at long range or use magic.

name: Ice Golem:Hammer
description: A large humanoid golem made of ice. Depending on the individual, they can attack at long range or use magic.

name: Ice Golem:Shooter
description: A large humanoid golem made of ice. Depending on the individual, they can attack at long range or use magic.

name: Ice Golem:Healer
description: A large humanoid golem made of ice. Depending on the individual, they can attack at long range or use magic.

name: Ice Golem:Heavily Armored
description: A large humanoid golem made of ice. Depending on the individual, they can attack at long range or use magic.

name: Evil tentacle
description: This fearsome being is imbued with powerful magical powers, corroding anything it touches and possessing a terrifying ability to suck out life force.

The Thunder Falcon is a lightning-clad bird. This bird can inflict an electric shock attack on nearby enemies. When the Thunder Falcon is knocked down, it will also unleash a 10-damage blitz attack on any surrounding enemy or friend in a 15-square radius.
